column4: I am having xmodmap problem in xfce - certain keys do not respond I manually put them in  ~/.Xmodmap and doing  xmodmap ~/.Xmodmap helps for a bit but then it is losing config again
anybody has the sale problems - google or forums did not help much
also I put the xmodmap ~/.Xmodmap in autostart but it will not work - where is the file for autostart so I can do it manually ?
in xfce? not sure. is the autostart script +x?
they have the gui thing in xfce for autostart but for this particular cvommand it does not work for some reason
I renamed the file ran xmodmap ~/.xmodmaprc and in about 30 mintutes mapping is wrong again
i thought the problem was that it didn't map it on login
map it on login will be the least of concerns if I get it to hold on to the changes I made
what does your file look like?
can I paste in pm ? it is about 8 lines
do you know what xmodmap -pke looks like before, after applying, and after it stops working?

I am getting this info trying to compare - do you mean just to apply the changes in the original file in xmodmap ? But there are tons of them us us_intern and I really do not know which one is it using
which exact file should I check for change in xmodmap ?
